title: "Artificial Sweetener Ups Appetite in Women, People With Obesity"
excerpt: "A new study suggests that replacing sugar (sucrose) with the nonnutritive sweetener sucralose may not have the desired weight-loss effect, and in fact, it appears to increase appetite in women and people with obesity."
